tuv.seg: Incentives for farmers to protect the environment
An Scéim Cosanta Timpeallachta Tuaithe, scéim cúnamh ioncaim atá dhá rith ag an Roinn Talmhaíochta, Iascaireachtaí agus Bia
The total forest area is 11% of the landscape
Ní chlúdaíonn coillearnacha ach 11% de thírdhreach
In 2000 over a million trees were planted on behalf of each home in the country
I 2000 plandáladh os cionn 1.2 milliún crann thar cheann gach teaghlach sa tír
